# consonaR - Consonance-based composing with Musical Scales and Spectra

## Overview

`consonaR` implements consonance-based algorithms for composing music,
based on William Setharesâ€™ *Tuning, Timbre, Spectrum, Scale* (Sethares
2013).

## References

Sethares, W. A. 2013. *Tuning, Timbre, Spectrum, Scale*. Springer
London.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`MIDI2freq()`](https://algocompsynth.github.io/consonaR/reference/MIDI2freq.md)
  : MIDI note number to frequency

- [`cents2ratio()`](https://algocompsynth.github.io/consonaR/reference/cents2ratio.md)
  : Cents to Ratio

- [`et_scale_table()`](https://algocompsynth.github.io/consonaR/reference/et_scale_table.md)
  : Create Equal-Tempered Scale Table

- [`freq2MIDI()`](https://algocompsynth.github.io/consonaR/reference/freq2MIDI.md)
  : Frequency to MIDI note number

- [`period_reduce()`](https://algocompsynth.github.io/consonaR/reference/period_reduce.md)
  : Period Reduce

- [`prodset_scale_table()`](https://algocompsynth.github.io/consonaR/reference/prodset_scale_table.md)
  : Create Product Set Scale Table

- [`ratio2cents()`](https://algocompsynth.github.io/consonaR/reference/ratio2cents.md)
  : Ratio to Cents

- [`ratio2factors()`](https://algocompsynth.github.io/consonaR/reference/ratio2factors.md)
  : Ratio to Factors

- [`sclfile_scale_table()`](https://algocompsynth.github.io/consonaR/reference/sclfile_scale_table.md)
  :

  Create Scale Table From a Scala `.scl` File

- [`sine_dissonance()`](https://algocompsynth.github.io/consonaR/reference/sine_dissonance.md)
  : Sine Wave Dissonance

  Tables](https://algocompsynth.github.io/consonaR/articles/about-scale-tables.md):
